definition: Amur Oblast, in far eastern Russia
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
solemn/reverent/calm/burial position in an ancestral tomb (old)/old variant of 默
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: Russia's Amur region and China's development adjacent.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯阿穆爾州與中國毗鄰地區的發展狀況。
